thread.title: The Oyster Bar’s Caviar Sandwich Is Back

author: Charles Passy
title: The Oyster Bar’s Caviar Sandwich Is Back
text:
New Yorkers have been known to bemoan the menu items lost to history.
Say, for instance, the date-nut bread sandwich from the long-closed Chock Full o’Nuts chain of dining spots. Or the orange drink at the similarly shuttered Nedick’s chain.
But diners, take heart: The caviar sandwich at the Grand Central Oyster Bar is back.
